data_table.description: Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Form, GTS Version B, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: GTSB1
variable.description: Was participant treated for diabetes in visit 3? Q1 [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Version B, exam 4]

variable.name: GTSB2
variable.description: Do you regularly take medication to control diabetes (high blood sugar)? Q2 [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Version B, exam 4]

variable.name: GTSB3
variable.description: Has participant fasted at least 10 hours? Q3 [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Version B, exam 4]

variable.name: GTSB4
variable.description: Have you had surgery to remove part of your stomach or small intestine? Q4 [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Version B, exam 4]

variable.name: GTSB5
variable.description: Are you on kidney dialysis? Q5 [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Version B, exam 4]

variable.name: GTSB6
variable.description: Are you willing to participate in the glucose tolerance test? Q6 [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Version B, exam 4]

variable.name: GTSBFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Version B, exam 4]

variable.name: GTSBCY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Version B, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Oral Glucose Tolerance Screening Version B, exam 4]
